document_data.name: Moonsword
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''Moonsword''''' was the weapon wielded by [[Eilistraee]], the [[drow]] goddess of moonlight and swordwork.

It was a ''+5 [[Sword of dancing|dancing]] [[keen]] [[bastard sword]]''.
